Medium: 48 photomechanical reproductions, 30 of works in various mediums by various artists (2 by Sarra-Lebedeva; 1 each by Akishin, Alt'man, Branott-Rossiné, Boguslavskaia, Buryshkin, Dobuzhinskii, Duplitskii, Kozlinskii, Kustodiev, Lebedev, Matiushin, Petrov-Vodkin, Raevskaia, Lev Rudnev, Shterenberg, Trotskii, and unknown artist, 4 by Izoram, 3 by The October Brigade, 2 by The Decorative Arts Institute, 2 by Proletkul't), and 18 of photographs by anonymous photographers
Title: Khudozhestvennoe oformlenie massovykh prazdnestv v Leningrade, 1918-1931
CreditLine: Gift of The Judith Rothschild Foundation
